summary.span: 提供当单击 、 或 控件时，显示 的控件的基本功能。

span.span: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a when a , , or control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的抽象基类， ，和，这可以托管项直接或主机下拉容器中的其他项。 is the abstract base class for , , and , which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container. 执行此操作通过设置属性设置为并设置属性的。You do this by setting the property to a and setting the property of the . 访问这些下拉列表项直接通过属性。Access these drop-down items directly through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和隐藏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide controls. summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与相关联，调用创建通用的下拉列表控件。If no is associated with the , a call to creates a generic drop-down control. > [!NOTE] > 如果下拉列表控件将自动生成的这意味着到集合中，添加项时，然后设置属性设置为显式的下拉列表控件，您可能会丢失数据。If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将分配控制对控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to assign a control to a control's property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: m
param.span: 通过引用传递的 ，表示要处理的窗口消息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 处理命令键。

span.span: Processes a command key.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息处理命令键的预处理过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括加速器和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 此方法的实现调用的中的项是否集合。The implementation of this method calls the of the if there are items in the collection. 否则，此实现中调用基类实现。Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.

permission.span: 适用于直接调用方和继承的类来调用此方法。

span.span: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: .

para.span: 重写时派生类中的方法，重写方法应返回以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生的类将很少，如果有过，需要重写此方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理来处理上、 下、 左、 右、 ENTER 和空格键密钥以便的下拉列表菜单层次结构中导航期间调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.

permission.span: 有关继承的类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来显示已设置的下拉列表控件属性。Use the method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示控制按钮按下时。The following code example demonstrates how to show a control when a button is pressed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
